actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to make the recommendations of the Secretary of State on license applications for exports of crime control instruments binding on the Secretary of Commerce.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the Secretary of Commerce to approve or deny export license applications for crime control instruments and equipment in accordance with the recommendations of the Secretary of State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to make the recommendations of the Secretary of State on license applications for exports of crime control instruments binding on the Secretary of Commerce.
